definition: (in the) past/former/previous/to go over/to pass by
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-

to go/to go to (a place)/(of a time etc) last/just passed/to send/to remove/to get rid of/to reduce/to be apart from in space or time/to die (euphemism)/to play (a part)/(when used either before or after a verb) to go in order to do sth/(after a verb of motion indicates movement away from the speaker)/(used after certain verbs to indicate detachment or separation)
acceptable/passable/justifiable/(of a course of action) to make sense
Today is the key to the past.
pinyin: xian4 zai4 shi4 guo4 qu5 yao4 shi5

definition: cannot stand by idly and watch/unable to put up with it any longer

sentences.english: I used to go to work by bike. (But I don't anymore, now. )
sentences.chinese: 我過去常騎自行車上班。

sentences.english: EarthSound's products have an excellent track record in the States.
sentences.chinese: 天籟的產品在美國有非常輝煌的過去。

sentences.english: The United States has been the world’s breadbasket for more than half a century.
sentences.chinese: 過去的半個世紀內，美國一直是世界的麪包籃子。

sentences.english: For the past few days, there has instead been rioting in the square.
sentences.chinese: 在過去的幾天裏，廣場上沒有垃圾，倒是有一場暴亂。

sentences.english: This past offseason there were tons of reports circulating around Kobe Bryant's wish to be traded.
sentences.chinese: 過去的那個休賽期，有很多關於科比想被交易的報道。

sentences.english: No cases have been reported outside Uige for the past five weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在過去5周內在威熱省之外未報告發生病例。

sentences.english: Tears are sometimes rolling down from your cheek whenever thinking of the past painful hardship and hurting experience.
sentences.chinese: 每當想起過去痛苦與傷心，眼淚總是潸然流下。

sentences.english: The past is a good place to visit, but certainly not a good place to stay.
sentences.chinese: 過去，是我們偶爾到訪的好去處，但顯然不宜長留。

sentences.english: Emerging Asia has grown by an annual average of 8% over the past three years—as fast as before the crisis.
sentences.chinese: 過去三年來以年均8%的速度增長着，和危機前一樣。

sentences.english: The point of our pacification operations was always described as "winning the hearts and minds" of the people.
sentences.chinese: 我們綏靖行動的意義過去一貫被描寫爲“深得人心。”

sentences.english: In a village there lived two men who had the self-same name.
sentences.chinese: 過去有兩個人住在一個村子裏。

sentences.english: Boeing says it found problems in the process used to reach the decision.
sentences.chinese: 波音公司表示他在過去做出決定的過程中發現了問題。

sentences.english: He drilled the ball past the pitcher.
sentences.chinese: 他使球越過投手直飛過去。

sentences.english: The owl swooped down on a mouse.
sentences.chinese: 貓頭鷹向一隻老鼠飛撲過去。

sentences.english: The most extreme winds are now blowing 10 percent faster than they used to.
sentences.chinese: 現在最大的風速比過去增快了10%。

sentences.english: Teachers in schools have been rubbished for the last ten years.
sentences.chinese: 過去十年學校教師一直受抨擊。

definition: outcome/result/conclusion/in the end/as a result/to kill/to dispatch
only/merely/no more than/but/however/anyway (to get back to a previous topic)/cannot be more (after adjectival)
to come and go/to have friendly relations with/in the past/previous
to come over/to manage/to handle/to be able to take care of
once/already/former/previously/ever/(past tense marker used before verb or clause)
to continue/to proceed with/to go on with
after all/all in all/when all is said and done/in the final analysis
